short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the cards in github to match trello's workflow. 1 click will open the card itself and 2 will forward to the normal page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin will change the functionality to click project cards and display them in a modal instead of going to a new page.

It will also add buttons to sort the projects page.

This modal will result in a 80% width box.

- settings now working properly
